TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HitTestResultBehavior extends System.Enum

summary.span: 确定在命中测试期间是否继续任何剩余可见对象的枚举。

span.span: Determines whether to continue the enumeration of any remaining visual objects during a hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命中测试结果回调方法定义在可视化树中的特定可视对象上标识命中测试时执行的操作。A hit test results callback method defines the actions that you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree. 执行这些操作后, 将返回一个值, 该值确定是否继续枚举任何其他视觉对象。After you perform the actions, you return a value that determines whether to continue the enumeration of any other visual objects. 可以在可视化树中枚举其几何包含特定坐标值的所有视觉对象。You can enumerate all visual objects in a visual tree whose geometry contains a specified coordinate value. 通过在命中测试回叫方法中返回 Continue, 你可以标识命中的所有视觉对象, 甚至包括可能由其他视觉对象部分或全部遮盖的视觉对象。By returning Continue in your hit test callback method, you can identify all visual objects that are hit, even those that may be partly or wholly obscured by other visual objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从命中测试结果回调方法返回值。The following example shows how to return a value from a hit test results callback method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#102)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior Continue = int32(1)

summary.span: 继续对可视化树层次结构中的下一个可见对象进行命中测试。

span.span: Continue hit testing against the next visual in the visual tree hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior Stop = int32(0)

summary.span: 停止任何进一步的命中测试，并从该回调返回。

span.span: Stop any further hit testing and return from the callback.
